title: CAnt log in all the time and when i do cant start a game
body: Just staying on the log in screen for ever and on the odd chance i do log in it crashes when i start a game. this happens even when i do have internet connection, so im not sure what the problem is

replies.body:
>this happens even when i do have internet connection

First thing to understand is that even if you have a perfectly fine connection, there may be something which is preventing League from communicating correctly to its server. Among these, a firewall or anti-virus is the most common reason why it has problems and oddities connecting. Try disabling all of these services and then try running League again.
